mapper.sql: t.id as id , t.request_ip as requestIp , t.login_way as loginWay , t.login_location as loginLocation , t.browser as browser , t.token as token , t.os as os , t.status as status , t.message as message , t.tenant_id as tenantId , t.create_by as createBy , t.create_time as createTime , t.remark as remark
mapper.insert:
insert into t_sys_login_log
id,
request_ip,
login_way,
login_location,
browser,
token,
os,
status,
message,
tenant_id,
create_by,
create_time,
remark,
#{id},
#{requestIp},
#{loginWay},
#{loginLocation},
#{browser},
#{token},
#{os},
#{status},
#{message},
#{tenantId},
#{createBy},
#{createTime},
#{remark},
mapper.update:
update t_sys_login_log
request_ip = #{requestIp},
login_way = #{loginWay},
login_location = #{loginLocation},
browser = #{browser},
token = #{token},
os = #{os},
status = #{status},
message = #{message},
tenant_id = #{tenantId},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
remark = #{remark},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select from t_sys_login_log t where t.id=#{id}
